dict.acceptation: 烤，烘焙；（将某物）烤硬；（变得）灼热，炎热；
烤，烘焙；烘烤食品；<美>烧烤会餐；

sent.orig: Pre-heat oven. Bake ribs for 8 minutes. Turn themand bake for 2 more minutes. Serve.
sent.trans: 预热焗炉上火，焗牛仔骨8分钟，反转再焗2分钟即成。

sent.orig: The dry prodnets:bake fish, while squid bake eel fish, mussel meat and so on.
sent.trans: 干燥产品：烤鱼片、整体鱿鱼、烤鳗、贻贝等。

sent.orig: How can ability differentiate cobaltic bake in a pan bake porcelain tooth?
sent.trans: 怎么样才能鉴别钴烙烤瓷牙？

sent.orig: Bread is cheap in this supermarket because they bake it themselves.
sent.trans: 这家超市的面包是自制的，所以便宜。

sent.orig: My parents ran a bakery, so naturally I learned to bake.
sent.trans: 父母经营着一家面包作坊，自然我也就学会了烤面包。
